name: Tozzi Ducks - Ownership Token
description:
This token grants the holder ownership privileges over The Tozzi Duck Machine. Ownership privileges include:

⏯️ Enabling / disabling duck minting

🧻 Configuring allow lists for minting

💸 Setting duck prices

📈 Withdrawing funds from duck sales

⚖️ Setting size of the duck population

🧑🏽‍⚖️ Accepting or rejecting custom duck submissions

👑 Granting duck titles

📟 Setting the Message of the Day (MotD)

🦆 OTHER STUFF!

Good luck, the fate of the duck population is in your hands!
